title: NCP插件禁止了mod物品放置。[望大神帮助]
txt_content: 服务器装上NCP以后，mod物品就无法放置了。一直破不了，所以望大神帮助。

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
blockplace:
    against:
      active: true
      actions: cancel
    autosign:
      active: true
      actions: cancel vl>10 log:bautosign:0:3:if cancel
    direction:
      active: true
      actions: cancel vl>10 log:bdirection:0:3:if cancel
    fastplace:
      active: true
      limit: 22
      shortterm:
        ticks: 10
        limit: 6
      actions: cancel vl>100 log:fastplace:3:5:cif cancel
    reach:
      active: true
      actions: cancel vl>5 log:breach:0:2:if cancel
    noswing:
      active: true
      exceptions:
      - WATER_LILY
      - FLINT_AND_STEEL
      actions: cancel vl>10 log:noswing:0:5:if cancel
    speed:
      active: true
      interval: 45
      actions: cancel vl>150 log:bpspeed:3:5:if cancel vl>1000 log:bpspeed:3:5:cif cancel
找到这里把所有的active项全部改为false再输入ncp reload重载试试

replies.author: 啊木哥
replies.txt_content: 检查自己的MOD文件夹是否真的有NPC，如果你在开启服务器状态加的请重启！

replies.author: 啊木哥
replies.txt_content:
849025143 发表于 2015-9-7 20:26
大哥，是NCP
看错了- -最近老吧NPC和NCP看混了- -
什么东西放不了，先说一下
